mapper.insert: insert into teampartner (partner_sid, partner_valid, partner_picture, partner_link, partner_timesstamp, partner_introduce, partner_note) values (#{partnerSid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{partnerValid,jdbcType=TINYINT},#{partnerPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partnerLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partnerTimesstamp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{partnerIntroduce,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{partnerNote,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update teampartner set partner_picture = #{partnerPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, partner_valid = #{partnerValid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, partner_link = #{partnerLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, partner_timesstamp = #{partnerTimesstamp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, partner_introduce = #{partnerIntroduce,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, partner_note = #{partnerNote,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where partner_sid = #{partnerSid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select partner_sid, partner_valid, partner_picture, partner_link, partner_timesstamp, partner_introduce, partner_note from teampartner where partner_sid = #{partnerSid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select partner_sid, partner_valid, partner_picture, partner_link, partner_timesstamp, partner_introduce, partner_note from teampartner
